A story about a dog who discovers his love for drawing and uses it as a way to communicate his thoughts and feelings to his owners.
A cartoon or comic strip series featuring a dog who uses his drawing skills to solve mysteries and help his friends.
A children's book that teaches kids about the importance of following their dreams and never giving up, using the story of a dog who starts drawing late but eventually becomes a successful artist.
